question: Bring out the incorrect statement
option1: Hasan Gangu was the founder of Bahamani Kingdom.
option2: Hasan Gangu had revolted against Muhammad bin Tughluq
option3: British forces were led by Hector Munro during the Battle of Buxar
option4: Bombay was acquired by England from France
answer: Bombay was acquired by England from France
explanation: Bombay was acquired by England from Portugal
